item.title: Time-Saving Bias
item.description:
Are You a Time-Saving Illusionist? Understanding the Time-Saving Bias #

We all crave efficiency. We want to optimize our lives, squeeze every drop of productivity out of our day. But our brains, clever as they are, sometimes play tricks on us when it comes to judging how much time we can actually save. This is where the Time-Saving Bias comes into play. Let’s dive into this fascinating cognitive quirk and learn how to spot it â€“ and outsmart it.
